eventDecorators.name: PayeeAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: PaymentReleased
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: PaymentReceived
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: totalShares
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total shares held by payees.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: released
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of Ether already released to a payee.

functionDecorators.name: inputPayeeData
functionDecorators.description: Creates an instance of `FreewayTokenDistributor` where each account in `payees` is assigned the number of shares at the matching position in the `shares` array. * All addresses in `payees` must be non-zero. Both arrays must have the same non-zero length, and there must be no duplicates in `payees`.

functionDecorators.name: initializeContract
functionDecorators.description: Creates an instance of `FreewayTokenDistributor` where each account in `payees` is assigned the number of shares at the matching position in the `shares` array. * All addresses in `payees` must be non-zero. Both arrays must have the same non-zero length, and there must be no duplicates in `payees`.

functionDecorators.name: distributeSafe
functionDecorators.description: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of Ether they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial owner.

functionDecorators.name: shares
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

functionDecorators.name: totalReleased
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total amount of Ether already released.

functionDecorators.name: distribute
functionDecorators.description: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of Ether they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
